task.title: How to setup a meeting URL?
task.shortdesc: When you click the button for the first time, if the meeting URL has not been set, the preference pane for the feature displays.

context.p: Setup meeting URL by clicking the Launch Meeting and Send Invitation button.
context.note: You can also configure the meeting URL by setting it in the preference pane from the gear icon.

step.cmd: Click the Launch Meeting and Send Invitation button.
A pop-up window displays to configure a meeting provider.
Enter the third party meeting URL in the Meeting URL text-box.

info.note: If the administrator has configured a URL on your behalf, the URL field may be partially filled.

step.cmd: When you successfully configure the meeting link, an invitation message displays with the hyperlink.

info.note: Configuring the URL helps you to setup a custom meeting invite, that you can send in the chat conversation message as an invitation message.
